name: Diego Buñuel

They are looking for: True crime with unique perspective; sports docs; music docs. Overall network strategy: Netflix seeks premium documentary content with global appeal, distinctive directorial vision, and exceptional access or stories that can attract audiences worldwide.

feature documentaries (90+ minutes) with festival potential

music documentaries focused on major international artists
distinctive directorial vision and cinematic approach
open to innovative documentary formats and approaches
